about_text:
Thank you so much for getting here! I'm Jezer.

After several years working in technical support within call centers, I realized I needed a change. I had always been interested in technology and programming, so driven by curiosity, I decided to give a chance to those internet ads that promise to ‚Äúwork from home doing what you love.‚Äù

That‚Äôs how I discovered the world of Quality Assurance and started my training at the TripleTen bootcamp, where I gained hands-on experience in test automation with Python and Selenium, API validation using Postman, and bug reporting with Jira, developing projects in each sprint.

In addition, on my own, I have learned HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Java, React, SQL, and Git, creating small personal projects to strengthen my understanding of web development and better grasp the entire software process.

Today, my focus is on QA Testing, with a special interest in automation, functional testing, and delivering high-quality software. I‚Äôm looking for opportunities where I can apply my knowledge, keep learning, and contribute to developing products that not only work well‚Äîbut make users‚Äô lives a little easier.
